001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatTypes;
009
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.AbstractCustomJavaDataTypeAdapter;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.object.DateTime;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateTimeItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IUntypedAtomicItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.time.LocalDateTime;
022import java.time.ZoneOffset;
023import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
024import java.time.format.DateTimeParseException;
025import java.util.List;
026
027import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
028
029import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
030
031public class DateTimeAdapter
032    extends AbstractCustomJavaDataTypeAdapter<DateTime, IDateTimeItem> {
033  @NonNull
034  private static final List<QName> NAMES = ObjectUtils.notNull(
035      List.of(
036          new QName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH.toASCIIString(), "date-time"),
037          // for backwards compatibility with original type name
038          new QName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH.toASCIIString(), "dateTime")));
039
040  DateTimeAdapter() {
041    super(DateTime.class);
042  }
043
044  @Override
045  public List<QName> getNames() {
046    return NAMES;
047  }
048
049  @Override
050  public JsonFormatTypes getJsonRawType() {
051    return JsonFormatTypes.STRING;
052  }
053
054  @SuppressWarnings("null")
055  @Override
056  public DateTime parse(String value) {
057    try {
058      return new DateTime(ZonedDateTime.from(DateFormats.DATE_TIME_WITH_TZ.parse(value)), true); // NOPMD - readability
059    } catch (DateTimeParseException ex) {
060      try {
061        LocalDateTime dateTime = LocalDateTime.from(DateFormats.DATE_TIME_WITHOUT_TZ.parse(value));
062        return new DateTime(ZonedDateTime.of(dateTime, ZoneOffset.UTC), false);
063      } catch (DateTimeParseException ex2) {
064        IllegalArgumentException newEx = new IllegalArgumentException(ex2.getLocalizedMessage(), ex2);
065        newEx.addSuppressed(ex);
066        throw newEx; // NOPMD - it's ok
067      }
068    }
069  }
070
071  @Override
072  public String asString(Object obj) {
073    DateTime value = (DateTime) obj;
074    String retval;
075    if (value.hasTimeZone()) {
076      @SuppressWarnings("null")
077      @NonNull
078      String formatted = DateFormats.DATE_TIME_WITH_TZ.format(value.getValue());
079      retval = formatted;
080    } else {
081      @SuppressWarnings("null")
082      @NonNull
083      String formatted = DateFormats.DATE_TIME_WITHOUT_TZ.format(value.getValue());
084      retval = formatted;
085    }
086    return retval;
087  }
088
089  @Override
090  public Class<IDateTimeItem> getItemClass() {
091    return IDateTimeItem.class;
092  }
093
094  @Override
095  public IDateTimeItem newItem(Object value) {
096    DateTime item = toValue(value);
097    return IDateTimeItem.valueOf(item);
098  }
099
100  @Override
101  protected IDateTimeItem castInternal(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
102    // TODO: bring up to spec
103    IDateTimeItem retval;
104    if (item instanceof IDateItem) {
105      retval = IDateTimeItem.valueOf(((IDateItem) item).asZonedDateTime());
106    } else if (item instanceof IStringItem || item instanceof IUntypedAtomicItem) {
107      retval = super.castInternal(item);
108    } else {
109      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(
110          String.format("unsupported item type '%s'", item.getClass().getName()));
111    }
112    return retval;
113  }
114
115}
